name: El Thor

trigger.text: KO up to 1 of your opponents characters with a cost equal or less to their life total.

text: Counter: Give up to 1 of your Leader or Characters +2000 for this battle. Then, if your opponent has 2 or less life, give that card an additional +2000 power.

effect.text: Give up to 1 of your Leader or Characters +2000 for this battle. Then, if your opponent has 2 or less life, give that card an additional +2000 power.
KO up to 1 of your opponents characters with a cost equal or less to their life total.
